summary.para: Lists values that specify the indent type for the first line in a paragraph.
The first line of a paragraph is indented to the left.
The first line of a paragraph is indented to the right.
The first line of a paragraph does not have any indent.
Contains settings that specify distances between the floating object borders and text that wraps around the object.
Specifies the distance between the bottom border of a floating object and text that wraps around the object.
Specifies the distance between the left border of a floating object and text that wraps around the object.
Specifies the distance between the right border of a floating object and text that wraps around the object.
Specifies the distance between the top border of a floating object and text that wraps around the object.
Lists values that specify the horizontal alignment for a floating object.
A floating object is aligned to the center of a horizontal anchor element.

Currently not supported and is displayed as the Left alignment type. Floating objects are aligned to the left side of a horizontal anchor element for odd pages, and the right side of a horizontal anchor element for even pages.
A floating object is aligned to the left side of a horizontal anchor element.
A floating object is not aligned.

Currently not supported and is displayed as the Right alignment type. Floating objects are aligned to the right side of a horizontal anchor element for odd pages, and the left side of a horizontal anchor element for even pages.
A floating object is aligned to the right side of a horizontal anchor element.
Lists values that specify the element to which the floating object is horizontally aligned.
A floating object is aligned to a character.
A floating object is aligned to a column.
Currently not supported and is treated as the LeftMargin anchor element. Floating objects are aligned to the left margin for odd pages, and the right margin for even pages.
A floating object is aligned to the left margin.
A floating object is aligned to the left or right page margin, or centered horizontally.
Currently not supported and is treated as the RightMargin anchor element. Floating objects are aligned to the right margin for odd pages, and the left margin for even pages.
A floating object is aligned to a page.
A floating object is aligned to the right margin.
Lists values that specify the vertical alignment for a floating object.
A floating object is aligned to the bottom of a vertical anchor element.
A floating object is aligned to the center of a vertical anchor element.

Currently not supported and is displayed as the Top alignment type. Floating objects are aligned to the top of a vertical anchor element for odd pages, and the bottom of a vertical anchor element for even pages.
A floating object is not aligned.

Currently not supported and is displayed as the Bottom alignment type. Floating objects are aligned to the bottom of a vertical anchor element for odd pages, and the top of a vertical anchor element for even pages.
A floating object is aligned to the top of a vertical anchor element.
Lists values that specify the element to which the floating object is vertically aligned.
A floating object is aligned to the bottom margin.
